subject: Central Bank of Nigeria
body:
Central Bank of Nigeria
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District,
Cadastral Zone,
P.M.B. 0187,
Garki Abuja, Nigeria.
                     CBN Authorized Payment Informations.
Attn: CBN Verified Beneficiary.
I wish to inform you in my capacity as the current Governor, Central Bank of Nigeria, and sequel to the removal and arrest of the former governor,  Mr. Godwin Emefiele due to corrupt related offences, your CBN Approved funds sum of (US$1,500,000.00) One Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars  which has been scheduled for payment, is awaiting your endorsement for payment to be made to you as directed by the CBN Board of Directors  and in line with a proclamations by the President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, President Ahmed Tinubu concerning all outstanding and overdue payments.
For your easy payment,i have decided to release the approved sum to you only through CBN Electronics Payment system called CBN Cash Swap Electronics payment System and direct confirmations through your local Bank ATM Card as all i needed is your already local bank ATM Card 16 digits serial numbers which will be used for your  CBN Cash Swap Electronics payment System directly from my office as the CBN Governor and this mode of Payment cost only the sum of USD300,00 Three Hundred Dollars payable to the Central Bank of Nigeria by you the beneficiary which is non deductible from your approved sum of USD1.5 Million,then the second option available for you to claim tis sum of USD1.5 Million is through CBN Customized Business ATM Visa Card normally used by International Businessmen and Government official which will be fully Activated and mailed to your Home or Office address in your Country as we have already signed an Agreement with United Parcel Service Courier Caomapnmy at a reducned discount delivery fees sum of USD250,00 only which you will send to pay the UPS mailing fees of your CBN Customized ATM Card to your doorstep,normally it cost more than this but due an agreement we reached with them hence it has to be brought down to that amount
With the present government effort to clear the backlog of debts any abandoned claim/transaction will be reverted to the government treasury.you can reach me on my direct mobile as thus: 2348173212684 for more information on this your payment.so make your choice to claim the approved sum from me and get back to me immediately for prompt actions either through  CBN Cash Swap Electronics payment System or sending to you the CBN Customized ATM Card without hitches as the choice is yours to make,the  CBN Cash Swap Electronics payment System is a 2hours confirmations into your bank account through your local bank ATM Card which you have to send to me the back copy and your bank name as well  for that hence is the latest electronics payment system now available,fast,quick,reliable and non indicating without extra cost attached on it.
Thanks for your understanding.
Sincerely yours,
Mr. Olayemi Cardoso
New Central Bank Governor, CBN

subject: Re:   Central Bank of Nigeria
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me as the new Central Bank Governor of CBN. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the release of my approved funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with any payment method.

Firstly, could you please clarify why the former governor, Mr. Godwin Emefiele, was removed and arrested? It would help me understand the situation better.

Secondly, I would like to know more about the CBN Cash Swap payment system. How does it work exactly? Are there any risks involved in using this method?

Lastly, if I choose to receive the funds through the CBN Customized Business ATM Visa Card, how long will it take for me to receive it? Is there any tracking number or confirmation that will be provided?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with claiming my approved sum.

Best wishes,
Louise
